Title: Relates to absentee voting
Summary: Extends certain chapters providing for expanded absentee voting until 2023.
LawCode: Amd ยง2, Chap 139 of 2020; amd ยง4, Chap 2 of 2022
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 139 of the laws of 2020 amending the election law relating to absentee voting, in relation to the effectiveness thereof; and to amend chapter 2 of the laws of 2022 amending the election law relating to absentee voting in village elections, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
